Key Match Events: Anthony Davis looked like the best player on the floor at both ends, with his motor putting Minnesota to shame. He finished with 36 points, 16 rebounds and three blocked shots.
The Wolves trailed by 19 in the first half.
Minnesota (0-1) committed 16 giveaways that led to 19 points for the Lakers (1-1).
Post-Match Reflections: Timberwolves coach Chris Finch said, 'We might have to simplify some things early, here. But I didn’t see a lot of resistance. Even when we had an opportunity to contain, we didn’t do a good job of that early on.'
Finch also stated, 'We’ve got to find another level of urgency. The season started, and we didn’t answer the bell.'
